# preferredFrameLatency

**Instance Property**

The amount of time, in frames, your app requests to render a frame.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredFrameLatency: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

The final latency may be bigger if the system needs more time, such as for windowed modes on macOS.



## Configuring a Display Link

- **preferredFrameRateRange**: A range of frequencies your app allows for frame updates, affecting how often the system invokes your delegate’s callback.
- **delegate**: An instance of a type your app implements that responds to the system’s callbacks.
